name: Monster Café (Rares The Noob)
description:
Monster Café

You're the proud owner of a newly opened café in town.  But there's a problem, your customers are grumpy monsters, who don't like their coffee cold. They also don't like being bothered and if you do, they will react accordingly to the monster way. They're here to drink a coffee during their break. You're rather clumpsy so remember to take a break yourself after some hard work or else you'll spill their coffee.

This game was made for the MiniJam87:Break with the limitation "The player is a pacifist".

Move with the arrow keys and interact with the enterkey.

 

Chanegs (after the deadline) in V1.1: Added some visuals for taking coffee, resting and needing a break.

Credits:

And the horrible but beautifull in their way monsters are by me. (As well as the coffee)
